website_summaries.verdict: An ideal option if you want a portable bed for your dog, or if you want a dog bed that can be easily stored.
pros: Customers love using this travel bed to take their dog camping or on road trips
Fits nicely in larger dog crates, making travel more comfortable for your pet
Easy to roll up and hide when you need to clean
cons: It's not as lightweight as some buyers were expecting, and is still a little bulky even when rolled up

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel bed. My greyhound is a service dog. She often goes to offices with me for appointments. She needs good padding on the hard floors. Her blanket did not satisfy. I saw this and thought it might work. It self-inflates (you can add air). The inflation holds amazingly well. I left hers unfolded and the air has stayed the same for over a month now with no indication of going down. She often elects to use it at home which is the best indicator of how she likes it. The bed part vacuums off easily. It folds up something like a yoga mat. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: gr8hnd

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: We had a couple other of these dog beds, and they lasted a long time. Good quality product. The bottom is waterproof so the pad stays dry on damp ground. Good for outdoor use as long as you don't have a lot of debris to get stuck in the top surface fabric. One we used in our barn got bits of hay stuck in it, which was hard to clean off. But in other applications, they are great! Like a "Thermarest" pad for dogs :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for my traveling pups.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found this on Amazon, I wanted one for my mini. As I also have one in my subie. It does not slide when you put on the breaks and gives some comfort for my pups when they ride in back. Great traveling mat. Rugged, as the dogs can get dirty and slop the water bowl.
customer_reviews.author: LoveDogs

customer_reviews.title: Fit for a 70-pounder
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 70 lb boofus. Booyeah. Pros: self inflating and comfortable for the dog. Cons: quite awkward to roll & carry for backpacking. Heavy at 3lb for all those ultralighters out there, but that’s the trade off for the cushioning. But I love the dog, little spoiled fuzzbutt he is, so I’ll gladly carry this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Claire D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution to the dog laying on the ground
customer_reviews.text: This pad (more of a pad than a bed) comes rolled up, and is secured with two straps attached to the pad. Well made material. Instructions say to give is a while to inflate on its own for the first time. It really does not inflate much at all. The interior material expands a little, but not much. But, you can simply blow into the valve on the back and then close it, and it helps a lot.k You can make it almost firm. Well made. High quality material.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I have 120Lb+ breeds and they just love these. I love them because you can take ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 120Lb+ breeds and they just love these. I love them because you can take them anywhere from the backyard to camping. Super easy to clean in the washing machine. We have referred many dog lovers to them.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverMoore

customer_reviews.title: Works great indoors and outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: We use it for home and camping. Very comfortable for me to sit on with Labrador dog. The air valves are on two corners and are a bit lumpy. The soft fabric, on top, looks a little frail but is holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Like Description
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchase of this travel dog bed....I have two Bernese Mountain Dogs and they travel with my husband and I on our daily work commute. The dogs love these - one side is fleece-like (good in colder weather months) but the other is nylon (all the better to stay cool in the summer months)! Easy to clean - cover unzips. Long lasting (has gone thru several washes unscathed). Recommend highly (and much less expensive than the Orvis or other high end brands..although those are great too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn DeNeut

customer_reviews.title: The only one my dog doesn't chew up!
customer_reviews.text: Previous dog beds I purchased had stuffing or foam inside and my dog would rip through them and scatter the stuffing. The first one I bought of this type (at Costco), he did nibble the tag off, but the bed itself is still intact (inside his crate). Some stitching has come loose (six inches) and I'll have to sew it back together, but that was after over a year of use and at least 3-4 washings. I decided to buy another one for him to lounge on outside of his crate and I'm looking for the perfect spot to put it. I highly recommend this nice cushy bed. Don't forget to blow it up some before tightening the air stopper!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a travel friendly, comfortable doggo bed
customer_reviews.text: I am SHOCKED that this is the only company that offers a doggo bed like this. I've been looking for one of these for about 10 years. We travel with our dog a lot and this makes life just a little bit easier for everyone. My only suggestion- offer a smaller version as well. I have a pretty large kennel and this is still just a bit big. I have to fold all the edges in a good 4" to make it work. 10/10 would buy that one too.
customer_reviews.author: Billy H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I go visiting quite often. This bed is large enough for her (big enough for a lab) but since it isn't super thick it is easy to find a place for it in either location. Also, being able to roll it up and snap it closed makes it as easy to transport as a yoga mat. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bev D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great have these all over the house for the dogs and in the kennel too. They love them and they are super easy to clean. They last for a super long time too. Totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient to Use
customer_reviews.text: The surface feels good, it is nice that you can control how much air is in it, and it cleans off very easily. My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.author: Greyhoundwalker

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! It's exactly what I was looking for to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It's exactly what I was looking for to put in the back of my car. We have a Bernese Mountain Dog and I want her to be comfy back there when we go places.
customer_reviews.author: Cameren Kotwicki

customer_reviews.title: Washable, comfy within limits, and weathers well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these dog beds I've purchased and they both work very well for my dogs. The only drawback is that the buckle for the strap and the inflation valve cause hard bumps in the surface that hurt my bare feet when I step on them on my living room floor. When I use these pads in the car traveling they cause me no problem at all, though they may irritate my dogs; I don't know how sensitive they are to lumps and bumps in their bedding. I haven't heard any complaints. I sure do like that I can remove the outer cover and wash it.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great dog beds!
customer_reviews.text: Great kennel beds for our giant dog and puppy. Relatively chew proof and great outdoors. You can pull the airbed out and wash the cover. Comes out looking like new. My pups love them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 month old German Shepherd. It arrived promptly and is super easy to inflate, zip, roll up and go. It keeps the back of my new car clean and dry and its nice to take out and throw anywhere for the pup so that she can take a nap. She loves it and will immediately settle down on it wherever we go! I would recommend it for sure :)
customer_reviews.author: nozamArama

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: THis large enough and soft enough for a person and it rolls up with straps. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Valley

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It's as described. However, my 105-lb shepherd mix won't use it for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great Camping Additiong
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to friends who do a lot of camping with dogs. It was very well received.
customer_reviews.author: Boggart

customer_reviews.title: Dogs give it two paws up
customer_reviews.text: Best beds for our dogs. Last a long time, well made. Wish they would just make the replacement cover, though.
customer_reviews.author: How

customer_reviews.title: Bought same mat after 5 years with the first one.
customer_reviews.text: Had the exact same mat for 5 years before finally replacing it with a new one. Very comfy for the dog, easy to bring somewhere else, and we love we can throw it in the washing machine. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy spoiling our dogs
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes now each dog has her own bed for camping and we get less complaints from them about the other taking up too much room... We are very happy spoiling our dogs. Cheers,
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Love these dog beds
customer_reviews.text: Love these dog beds! They are durable, last long, and my dog does not chew them. Easy to wash cover! Only down side is the price. :-(
customer_reviews.author: KC CAT

customer_reviews.title: Best dog beds I have purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these dog beds, they are durable and washable. Two I have had for over 5 years, easy to roll up for travel too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Viuhkola

customer_reviews.title: Great product, holds up extremely well.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is pricey but worth the money. I bought my first one at Costco about 3 years ago for probably half the price. It was so great, my husband wanted one for his car. It cleans up well, is tough and sturdy. I lay a couple towels over it to collect the worst of the dirt and mud.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My third one of these. I now have one in each Jeep and one in my bedroom. So easy to clean and move around. My Dogs love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Almost Handy

customer_reviews.title: Best pad you can find
customer_reviews.text: Best pad you can find. I purchased one of these before at Costco for around $25, but they ran out of them and did not have any plans to get more.
customer_reviews.author: epipko

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have six of these now for our two dogs. One set at our second weekender and then two at our other house.
customer_reviews.author: Sneezy

customer_reviews.title: Dog Bed Is Great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials, light enough to easily move from house to suv an back. Easy to pull the cover off and wash.
customer_reviews.author: storm

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Dog Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! This is the most wonderful dog bed we have ever owned for our Rottweiler. It inflates to about 1 1/2 inches and remains inflated. We don't use it for travel, but for daily use in our living room. Grey with a brick colored edge it matches our tiled floor. We have had it for about three years and just decided to buy another one for outside on our covered deck. Too bad we could not get the same color; this one is grey and charcoal. The cover is washable. Super buy! Get one too!
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Herman de Jong

customer_reviews.title: A hit with the dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really enjoy these beds. They are greyhounds who have access to many, many beds on which to rest their skinny little butts, but they always gravitate to these when we are out and about. I now just leave them in the back of my car full-time so that they can rest comfortably on the road and we can pull them out if we ever need them. My only complaint is that I don't feel like they self-inflate quite enough, and I always end up blowing into them like a really big balloon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schiro

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works great for the back of the truck, camping, very tough. It's a little thin but dog seems OK with that.
customer_reviews.author: Gregor Visconty

customer_reviews.title: life will be good. They appear to be constructed the same as ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used these beds for years. If these last as well as my last ones, life will be good. They appear to be constructed the same as those they will replace.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: We have had these before and never had this problem.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these. One no longer holds air. Why would that be?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is great, especially to use outside on an enclosed area. Our dog loves to sleep outside on our covered porch. We have this bed for her and she adores it. Truly ruff and tuff.
customer_reviews.author: beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my 2006 crew cab GMC
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my 2006 crew cab GMC. With the rear seats folded two of them cover the whole rear like they were made for it...
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great bed, big enough for my 80lb dog buddy
customer_reviews.text: Great bed, big enough for my 80lb dog buddy. Tough cloth and the dog seems to like the inflatable pad.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen E Olson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bed for our golden retreiver in our camper ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel bed for our golden retreiver in our camper van. He loves it, and its easy to roll up and put away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: MJV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing.....goes everywhere and is super durable and easy to roll/unroll- the dog loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: melanie bursick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is great for outside for our Golden Retriever. Mainly use during cool weather, as it keeps the dog warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Me and the dog loved it so much that I bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford E Letts III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are the best the dogs love them and the cats rolls all over them
customer_reviews.author: LINDA E TAIBL

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars if would stay inflated but since it doesn't , 2 stars only
customer_reviews.author: wkra03

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping/travel
customer_reviews.text: I have a fussy boxer who refuses to lay on any hard surface, so I got this bed for camping trips/traveling. She immediately went to lay down on the bed when I inflated it and used it all weekend while we were outside. The bottom is durable enough to put on the ground. I tossed the cover in the wash after camping and it cleaned up very well - even the fleece. We use it as an extra mat in the house for the meantime so this was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andie K.

product_meta.title: Lightspeed Outdoors Self Inflating Fleece Top Cover Travel Dog Bed | Kennel Bed ,32-Inch by 42 Inch
product_meta.description: The Light speed Outdoors 1-1/2-inch thick self inflating travel dog bed with a durable puncture and water resistant mattress base, cushioned sides and a removable thick soft fleece top provides the ultimate in comfort for your four legged friend when on the go. The easy to roll up self deflating mattress closes securely with straps to a 32-inch by 6-inch size for convenient storing and travel. To inflate, simply unroll and twist open the nozzle for the mattress to self inflate. When inflated, The 42-inch long by 32-inch wide bed will fit most pets. Use the inflated dog bed at home, in SUVs, RVs and tents. Great to take along pet bed on Road trips or for boating. Outer shell is machine washable.
feature_bullets: Open size 42" X 32" X 2"; rolled size 32" X 6"; weight 3. 6 lbs.
1. 5" Inner foam mattress self inflates with a twist of a nozzle; adjustments can be made by blowing air in or pushing air out
Machine washable puncture resistant and water resistant bottom and sides protect the bed from rough surfaces while the fleece top keeps your furry friend comfortable
Built in nylon Buckle straps for easy storage and transport

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
